borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p><span style="font-size: 11pt; text-align: justify;">The proposed first
floor rear extension would&nbsp;by reason of the scale, siting and
design&nbsp;result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss
of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers at No. 467 Valence Avenue,
therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Paragraph 130 of the National Planning
Policy Framework National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, July 2021)</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local
Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March
2011)</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policy DMD1 of The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
December 2021); and</span><o:p></o:p></p><p>











</p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations
Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</span><o:p></o:p></p>

<p style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size:11.0pt">The proposed first
floor side extension would&nbsp;by reason of its width, mass and bulk appear as
an incongruous additional&nbsp;and it would have an enclosing effect closing
the gap between the two terraces. The proposalw would negatively impact on the
character and appearance of the dwellinghouse and the wider area which is
considered to be a non-designated heritage asset.&nbsp; As such, the proposed
development is contrary to:</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Paragraphs 124, 126,&nbsp;130, and 203 of
the&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy
Framework&nbsp; (DLUHC, July 2021)</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policies&nbsp;D1, D4, and HC1&nbsp;of the
London Plan (March 2021)</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policies CP2 and CP3 of the London Borough
of Barking and Dagenham Core Strategy (July 2010);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policies BP2 and BP11 of the London Borough
of Barking and Dagenham Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March
2011);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- Policies SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 4 of the
London Borough of Barking and Dagenham Draft London Plan (Regulation 19);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p>











</p><p><span style="font-size:11.0pt">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations
Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</span><o:p></o:p></p>
description: Construction of a first floor rear and side extension.
